linter-exceptions.finish-args-flatpak-spawn-access: Required to execute host tmux binary. Tmux cannot run inside sandbox due to PTY and socket requirements.
linter-exceptions.finish-args-host-tmp-access: Required to access tmux sockets located in /tmp/tmux-*. Tmux uses /tmp for IPC.
linter-exceptions.finish-args-arbitrary-dbus-access: Required for org.freedesktop.Flatpak to use flatpak-spawn for host tmux execution.
linter-exceptions.finish-args-home-filesystem-access: Required for integrated file browser feature to navigate and manage user files.
